channel.title: Cant connect to tor when using kvm nor from jessie
channel.description:
i have problem with connecting to tor in debian jessie. i have removed windows and trying to get use to debian , i have installed the kvm and whonix in jesse also downloaded tor browser to debian but non of them seems to be working, tor cant get connected i even used bridges to make it work but also failed to do that. thats what it says from tor clipboard:-
[code]07/21/2015 10:26:44.532 [NOTICE] DisableNetwork is set. Tor will not make or accept non-control network connections. Shutting down all existing connections. 07/21/2015 10:26:50.210 [NOTICE] Opening Socks listener on 127.0.0.1:9150 07/21/2015 10:26:52.442 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 5%: Connecting to directory server 07/21/2015 10:26:52.444 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 10%: Finishing handshake with directory server 07/21/2015 10:26:52.779 [WARN] Proxy Client: unable to connect to 109.105.109.163:38980 ("general SOCKS server failure") 07/21/2015 10:26:52.819 [WARN] Proxy Client: unable to connect to 109.105.109.163:47779 ("general SOCKS server failure") 07/21/2015 10:26:54.849 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 15%: Establishing an encrypted directory connection 07/21/2015 10:26:55.360 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 20%: Asking for networkstatus consensus 07/21/2015 10:26:56.506 [NOTICE] new bridge descriptor 'LeifEricson' (fresh): $A09D536DD1752D542E1FBB3C9CE4449D51298239~LeifEricson at 83.212.101.3 07/21/2015 10:26:56.506 [NOTICE] I learned some more directory information, but not enough to build a circuit: We have no usable consensus. 07/21/2015 10:26:57.542 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 25%: Loading networkstatus consensus 07/21/2015 10:26:59.435 [NOTICE] new bridge descriptor 'Unnamed' (fresh): $AF9F66B7B04F8FF6F32D455F05135250A16543C9~Unnamed at 169.229.59.75 07/21/2015 10:26:59.435 [NOTICE] I learned some more directory information, but not enough to build a circuit: We have no usable consensus. 07/21/2015 10:27:05.450 [NOTICE] Closing no-longer-configured Socks listener on 127.0.0.1:9150 07/21/2015 10:27:05.460 [NOTICE] DisableNetwork is set. Tor will not make or accept non-control network connections. Shutting down all existing connections. 07/21/2015 10:27:05.460 [NOTICE] Closing old Socks listener on 127.0.0.1:9150 07/21/2015 10:27:05.460 [WARN] We were supposed to connect to bridge '83.212.101.3:80' using pluggable transport 'obfs3', but we can't find a pluggable transport proxy supporting 'obfs3'. This can happen if you haven't provided a ClientTransportPlugin line, or if your pluggable transport proxy stopped running. 07/21/2015 10:27:05.460 [WARN] Problem bootstrapping. Stuck at 25%: Loading networkstatus consensus. (Can't connect to bridge; PT_MISSING; count 1; recommendation warn; host A09D536DD1752D542E1FBB3C9CE4449D51298239 at 83.212.101.3:80) 07/21/2015 10:27:05.460 [WARN] 2 connections have failed: 07/21/2015 10:27:05.460 [WARN] 2 connections died in state handshaking (proxy) with SSL state (No SSL object) 07/21/2015 10:27:12.100 [NOTICE] Delaying directory fetches: DisableNetwork is set. [/code]
Internet connection is there i can open iceweasel through the clearnet working good but i donno whats happening to tor , and btw jessie is fresh nothing have been installed b4.
so do u have any idea how to make this work ? because i didnt faced that with my trial before. thnx

item.title: Cant connect to tor when using kvm nor from jessie
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
thnx now all working in tor on jessie and i think it must be working also in whonix.

Read full topic

Moved to support forum.

This is your problem. Fix your clock.

item.title: Cant connect to tor when using kvm nor from jessie
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
i did used meek-google and amazon but its the same thing. and this is the message from the clipboard:-

07/21/2015 14:16:28.296 [NOTICE] DisableNetwork is set. Tor will not make or accept non-control network connections. Shutting down all existing connections. 
07/21/2015 14:16:48.622 [NOTICE] DisableNetwork is set. Tor will not make or accept non-control network connections. Shutting down all existing connections. 
07/21/2015 14:16:48.622 [NOTICE] DisableNetwork is set. Tor will not make or accept non-control network connections. Shutting down all existing connections. 
07/21/2015 14:16:48.622 [NOTICE] DisableNetwork is set. Tor will not make or accept non-control network connections. Shutting down all existing connections. 
07/21/2015 14:16:48.622 [NOTICE] Opening Socks listener on 127.0.0.1:9150 
07/21/2015 14:16:50.207 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 5%: Connecting to directory server 
07/21/2015 14:16:50.208 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 10%: Finishing handshake with directory server 
07/21/2015 14:16:53.800 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 15%: Establishing an encrypted directory connection 
07/21/2015 14:16:53.776 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 20%: Asking for networkstatus consensus 
07/21/2015 14:16:55.587 [NOTICE] new bridge descriptor 'UtahMeekBridge' (fresh): $46D4A71197B8FA515A826C6B017C522FE264655B~UtahMeekBridge at 0.0.2.0 
07/21/2015 14:16:55.587 [NOTICE] I learned some more directory information, but not enough to build a circuit: We have no usable consensus. 
07/21/2015 14:16:56.222 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 25%: Loading networkstatus consensus 
07/21/2015 14:17:53.200 [WARN] Our clock is 5 hours, 42 minutes behind the time published in the consensus network status document (2015-07-22 00:00:00 UTC).  Tor needs an accurate clock to work correctly. Please check your time and date settings! 
07/21/2015 14:17:53.200 [NOTICE] I learned some more directory information, but not enough to build a circuit: We have no recent usable consensus. 
07/21/2015 14:18:03.250 [NOTICE] Closing no-longer-configured Socks listener on 127.0.0.1:9150 
07/21/2015 14:18:03.250 [NOTICE] DisableNetwork is set. Tor will not make or accept non-control network connections. Shutting down all existing connections. 
07/21/2015 14:18:03.250 [NOTICE] Closing old Socks listener on 127.0.0.1:9150 
07/21/2015 14:18:04.207 [NOTICE] Delaying directory fetches: DisableNetwork is set.

is there any configuration when installing kvm might affecting the tor network ? (i used the standard installation like in the screen shots).

any further ideas ? also should i report this to tor community ?

btw, when i use tail running from a live DVD tor is working fine.i dont know if there is any different connection mechanism when using live DVD or tail and whonix inside kvm or just the host jessie

Read full topic
item.source: Cant connect to tor when using kvm nor from jessie

item.title: Cant connect to tor when using kvm nor from jessie
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Most probably your connection to Tor is being censored by your ISP. Try using meek pluggable transport in TBB on your host and see if you can connect.

Read full topic
item.source: Cant connect to tor when using kvm nor from jessie

item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
i have problem with connecting to tor in debian jessie. i have removed windows and trying to get use to debian , i have installed the kvm and whonix in jesse also downloaded tor browser to debian but non of them seems to be working, tor cant get connected i even used bridges to make it work but also failed to do that.
thats what it says from tor clipboard:-

07/21/2015 10:26:44.532 [NOTICE] DisableNetwork is set. Tor will not make or accept non-control network connections. Shutting down all existing connections. 07/21/2015 10:26:50.210 [NOTICE] Opening Socks listener on 127.0.0.1:9150 07/21/2015 10:26:52.442 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 5%: Connecting to directory server 07/21/2015 10:26:52.444 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 10%: Finishing handshake with directory server 07/21/2015 10:26:52.779 [WARN] Proxy Client: unable to connect to 109.105.109.163:38980 ("general SOCKS server failure") 07/21/2015 10:26:52.819 [WARN] Proxy Client: unable to connect to 109.105.109.163:47779 ("general SOCKS server failure") 07/21/2015 10:26:54.849 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 15%: Establishing an encrypted directory connection 07/21/2015 10:26:55.360 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 20%: Asking for networkstatus consensus 07/21/2015 10:26:56.506 [NOTICE] new bridge descriptor 'LeifEricson' (fresh): $A09D536DD1752D542E1FBB3C9CE4449D51298239~LeifEricson at 83.212.101.3 07/21/2015 10:26:56.506 [NOTICE] I learned some more directory information, but not enough to build a circuit: We have no usable consensus. 07/21/2015 10:26:57.542 [NOTICE] Bootstrapped 25%: Loading networkstatus consensus 07/21/2015 10:26:59.435 [NOTICE] new bridge descriptor 'Unnamed' (fresh): $AF9F66B7B04F8FF6F32D455F05135250A16543C9~Unnamed at 169.229.59.75 07/21/2015 10:26:59.435 [NOTICE] I learned some more directory information, but not enough to build a circuit: We have no usable consensus. 07/21/2015 10:27:05.450 [NOTICE] Closing no-longer-configured Socks listener on 127.0.0.1:9150 07/21/2015 10:27:05.460 [NOTICE] DisableNetwork is set. so do u have any idea how to make this work ? because i didnt faced that with my trial before. thnx
